titles: An epytaphe vppon the death of the right reuerend and learned father in God I. Iuell, doctor of diuinitie and bishop of Sarisburie, whom God called to his marcie the 22. of September. 1571.
author: Elderton, William, d. 1592?
place: Jmprynted at London, in Fleetestreate beneath the Conduit at the signe of S. John Euangelist :
notes: Date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproductions of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
